pages.about: Discover RoyalOasis - Your Ultimate Luxury Resort & Casino Experience RoyalOasis Home About us Casino Сontact About us Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis" is more than just a destination; it's an experience. Nestled in the heart of Serbian, our luxurious establishment combines world-class gaming with top-tier hospitality to create an unparalleled retreat for discerning travelers and avid gamers alike. Our Mission At Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis," our mission is simple: to provide our guests with an extraordinary experience that exceeds their expectations. Whether you're here to indulge in the excitement of our casino, relax in our lavish accommodations, or savor gourmet cuisine at our fine dining restaurants, we are committed to delivering unparalleled service and hospitality at every turn. Step into a world of refinement and elegance with our meticulously designed rooms and suites. Each accommodation is thoughtfully appointed with modern amenities and luxurious touches to ensure a comfortable and unforgettable stay. Experience the thrill of gaming like never before at our state-of-the-art casino. With a wide range of gaming options, including slot machines, table games, and live poker, our elegant gaming floors offer endless excitement for every level of player. ALL OFFERS Relax on Vacation At Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis," we understand the importance of relaxation on vacation. That's why we've created the perfect environment for you to unwind, rejuvenate, and escape from the stresses of everyday life. 1 Tranquil Oasis: Discover Serenity at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis" Indulge in a haven of peace and relaxation at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." Escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and immerse yourself in a tranquil oasis where luxury meets serenity. 2 Revitalize Your Senses: Spa Escapes at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis" Embark on a journey of rejuvenation and renewal at our luxurious spa. Experience a range of blissful treatments and therapies designed to revitalize your body, mind, and spirit, leaving you feeling refreshed and invigorated. 3 Poolside Bliss: Unwind by the Pool at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis" Savor the ultimate relaxation experience as you bask in the sun and lounge by our pristine poolside oasis. Whether you're taking a refreshing dip or simply unwinding in a cabana, our pool area offers the perfect retreat for soaking up the sun and enjoying leisurely moments. 4 Culinary Delights: Gastronomic Adventures at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis" Embark on a culinary journey of exquisite flavors and tastes at our world-class restaurants. From gourmet cuisine to casual dining options, each dish is expertly crafted to tantalize your taste buds and satisfy your cravings, ensuring a memorable dining experience at every meal. PROFESSIONALS Meet The Team Meet the dedicated individuals who bring passion, expertise, and professionalism to every aspect of your experience at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." John Smith General Manager Emily Johnson Head Chef Michael Brown Spa Director Reviews Testimonials "RoyalOasis exceeded all my expectations. The combination of elegant rooms, world-class casino, and top-notch entertainment created a truly magical experience. The gourmet dining options were phenomenal, and the spa treatments were incredibly rejuvenating. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a luxurious getaway." We're thrilled to announce our upcoming expansion plans, which will include new amenities, enhanced accommodations, and exciting entertainment options. Stay tuned for updates as we continue to elevate your experience at our premier destination. With a wealth of experience and a passion for culinary innovation, Chef Anderson will lead our team in creating unforgettable dining experiences that showcase the finest flavors and ingredients. pages.casino: Experience Thrilling Excitement at RoyalOasis Casino - Premier Gaming Destination RoyalOasis Home About us Casino Сontact Casino Welcome to the beating heart of excitement and anticipation – the Casino at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." Step into a world where the thrill of gaming meets the luxury of a premier resort destination. Let us guide you through an immersive and exhilarating casino experience unlike any other. Blackjack: Where Strategy Meets Excitement Test your skills and challenge the dealer in a game of blackjack at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." With its blend of strategy, suspense, and excitement, blackjack offers an exhilarating experience for players of all levels. Roulette: Spin to Win in a Game of Chance Take a spin on the roulette wheel and experience the thrill of anticipation at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." With its combination of luck and strategy, roulette offers a captivating and dynamic gaming experience that keeps players on the edge of their seats. Slot Machines: Jackpots Await at Every Spin Step up to the slot machines and discover a world of excitement and possibility at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." With a wide selection of themed games and progressive jackpots, our slot machines offer endless entertainment and the chance to win big with every spin. Poker: Test Your Skills in the Ultimate Card Game Join the action-packed world of poker at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis" and test your skills against players from around the globe. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a beginner, our poker tables offer an exhilarating gaming experience that's sure to keep you coming back for more. Baccarat: A Game of Elegance and Sophistication Experience the elegance and sophistication of baccarat at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." With its simple rules and fast-paced gameplay, baccarat offers an exciting and immersive gaming experience that's perfect for both beginners and experienced players alike. Craps: Roll the Dice and Feel the Excitement Roll the dice and feel the excitement of craps at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." With its high-energy atmosphere and multiple betting options, craps offers a thrilling gaming experience that's guaranteed to keep you entertained for hours on end. Security and Fairness Ensuring the safety and security of our guests is our top priority at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." We employ cutting-edge security measures and adhere to strict regulatory standards to provide a safe and fair gaming environment for all players. Variety of Games Experience a world of gaming diversity at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." With a wide selection of games ranging from classic table games like blackjack and roulette to modern slot machines and electronic games, there's something for every gaming enthusiast to enjoy. Exceptional Customer Service At Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis," we believe in delivering exceptional customer service that goes above and beyond expectations. Our dedicated staff is available to assist guests with any inquiries or concerns, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable gaming experience for all. Luxurious Atmosphere Immerse yourself in luxury and sophistication at Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis." From the elegant décor to the plush furnishings, every aspect of our casino exudes opulence and refinement, providing an unforgettable gaming experience in a truly lavish setting. Service Room & Suites At Casino-Hotel "RoyalOasis," we pride ourselves on delivering service excellence in every aspect of your stay, starting with our luxurious rooms and suites. Experience the epitome of comfort, elegance, and personalized attention as we cater to your every need and desire. $3000 per night Royal Presidential Suite Indulge in unparalleled luxury and grandeur in our Royal Presidential Suite. Spanning over 2000 square feet, this exquisite suite features a private terrace with panoramic views, a spacious living area perfect for entertaining, and a lavish marble bathroom with a Jacuzzi. Experience VIP treatment with personalized butler service and exclusive access to premium amenities throughout your stay. 2000 sq. ft. $2500 per night Executive Penthouse Elevate your stay with our Executive Penthouse, boasting 1800 square feet of refined elegance. Enjoy sweeping city views from your private balcony, unwind in the separate living area, and rejuvenate in the luxurious marble bathroom with a rain shower and deluxe bath amenities. With contemporary design and upscale furnishings, this penthouse offers the ultimate in sophistication and comfort. 1800 sq. ft. $2000 per night Luxury Oceanfront Villa Experience seaside serenity in our Luxury Oceanfront Villa, offering 1500 square feet of tranquil luxury. Relax on your private terrace overlooking the ocean, unwind in the spacious living area, and rejuvenate in the marble bathroom with a deep soaking tub. With elegant décor and modern amenities, this villa provides a secluded retreat for an unforgettable escape. 1500 sq. ft. $1500 per night Grand Deluxe Suite Step into sophistication in our Grand Deluxe Suite, featuring 1200 square feet of luxurious comfort. Enjoy stunning city views from your floor-to-ceiling windows, relax in the separate living area, and pamper yourself in the marble bathroom with a walk-in shower and deluxe bath amenities. With stylish design and upscale furnishings, this suite offers a refined retreat for discerning travelers. 1200 sq. ft. $1200 per night Junior Executive Suite Experience elevated luxury in our Junior Executive Suite, boasting 900 square feet of contemporary elegance. Relax in the spacious living area, unwind in the plush king-size bed, and refresh in the marble bathroom with a rainfall shower and premium bath products. With modern amenities and chic décor, this suite provides a sophisticated sanctuary for your stay. 900 sq. ft. $800 per night Deluxe City View Room Enjoy urban luxury in our Deluxe City View Room, offering 600 square feet of stylish comfort. Admire city skyline views from your large windows, unwind in the cozy seating area, and rejuvenate in the marble bathroom with a deep soaking tub. With contemporary design and upscale amenities, this room is perfect for both business and leisure travelers seeking a refined urban escape. 600 sq. ft. pages.privacy-policy: RoyalOasis Privacy Policy - Your Privacy Matters to Us RoyalOasis Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy Policy RoyalOasis collects personal information such as name, email address, phone number, and payment details to facilitate reservations, bookings, and guest services. This information is voluntarily provided by guests and may also include demographic data and preferences to enhance the guest experience. Personal information collected by RoyalOasis is used for various purposes, including processing reservations, communicating with guests, providing personalized services, and improving our offerings. This information may also be used for marketing purposes with guest consent, and to comply with legal obligations and regulations. RoyalOasis employs industry-standard security measures to protect the personal information of our guests. This includes encryption, firewalls, and secure data storage protocols to safeguard against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction of guest data. RoyalOasis may share personal information with trusted third-party service providers, such as payment processors, to facilitate guest transactions and services. Additionally, guest information may be shared with law enforcement agencies or regulatory authorities as required by law. RoyalOasis uses cookies and tracking technologies to enhance the guest experience on our website and improve our services. These technologies may collect information such as IP addresses, browser types, and browsing behavior to personalize content, analyze website traffic, and target advertising. Guests have the right to access, update, and correct their personal information held by RoyalOasis. They also have the option to opt out of receiving marketing communications or to withdraw consent for the collection and use of certain data. RoyalOasis does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 18 without parental consent. Parents or guardians who believe that their child has provided personal information to RoyalOasis without consent should contact us immediately to request deletion of the information. The RoyalOasis website may contain links to third-party websites or services. These sites have their own privacy policies and practices, which are not governed by RoyalOasis. Guests are encouraged to review the privacy policies of these third-party sites before providing any personal information. RoyalOasis@gmail.com. RoyalOasis reserves the right to update or modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on our website, and guests are encouraged to review the policy periodically for updates. Continued use of our services after changes are made indicates acceptance of the updated policy. For questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy or the handling of personal information, guests can contact RoyalOasis using the contact information provided on our website. We are committed to addressing guest inquiries and ensuring compliance with privacy regulations. RoyalOasis retains guest personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal and regulatory requirements. Once the information is no longer needed, it is securely deleted or anonymized to prevent unauthorized access or use. RoyalOasis retains guest personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal and regulatory requirements. Once the information is no longer needed, it is securely deleted or anonymized to prevent unauthorized access or use. By providing personal information to RoyalOasis, guests consent to the collection, use, and processing of their data in accordance with this privacy policy. Guests also consent to the transfer of their information to third parties as necessary for the purposes outlined in this policy. RoyalOasis@gmail.com. In the event of a data breach that compromises the security of guest personal information, RoyalOasis will notify affected guests and regulatory authorities as required by law. Notifications will include details of the breach, steps taken to mitigate harm, and recommendations for guest protection. Guests have the right to object to the processing of their personal information by RoyalOasis for direct marketing purposes or on grounds relating to their particular situation. RoyalOasis will respect such objections and cease processing the data unless there are compelling legitimate grounds for the processing. Guests who believe that RoyalOasis has violated their privacy rights or failed to comply with data protection regulations have the right to lodge a complaint with the relevant supervisory authority. RoyalOasis is committed to cooperating with regulatory authorities to address guest concerns. RoyalOasis does not engage in automated decision making or profiling activities that significantly affect guests. Any automated processing of guest data is transparent, and guests have the right to request human intervention or review of such decisions. Guests are responsible for ensuring the accuracy and completeness of the personal information they provide to RoyalOasis. Inaccurate or outdated information may impact the quality of service provided and could result in delays or errors in bookings or reservations. By using RoyalOasis services or accessing our website, guests acknowledge that they have read, understood, and agreed to the terms of this privacy policy. Guests are encouraged to contact RoyalOasis with any questions or concerns about the policy. RoyalOasis is committed to promoting guest awareness and understanding of privacy practices and data protection principles. We provide resources, information, and guidance to help guests make informed decisions about their personal information and privacy rights. Home About us Casino Сontact Privacy policy Terms and conditions Disclaimer © 2024 RoyalOasis. All rights reserved.
